title: wine_Domaines_Devillard_2014_Château_de_Chamirey_Les_Cinq__(Mercurey)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 106839.
country: France.
description: This is a blend of the best barrels from the five Mercurey Premier Crus owned by the Devillard family. First produced in the 2010 vintage, the wine is now made in most vintages. It is a rich wine, bringing out the pure red fruitiness of a Mercurey and its beautifully integrated structure. It is concentrated and very dense, packed with vanilla, mint and dark coffee flavors as well as the fruit. Age this wine, at least until 2020..
designation: Château de Chamirey Les Cinq.
points: 94.
price: 95.0.
province: Burgundy.
region_1: Mercurey.
